item.title: 新加坡逮捕与 Nvidia 服务器欺诈案有关的三人
item.description: 新加坡警方逮捕了三名男子，他们涉嫌诈骗一家未具名的计算服务器供应商，使当地中介机构在向全球输送 Nvidia 公司芯片方面所扮演的角色成为焦点。【原文：Singaporean police arrested three men for allegedly defrauding an unnamed supplier of computing servers, casting a spotlight on local intermediaries’ role in funneling Nvidia Corp. chips around the world.】

item.title: 小盘股之后，印度熊市逼近中盘股
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特斯拉暴跌 40%，吓坏了投身杠杆 ETF 的韩国人
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc.’s share price slump is taking a toll on risk-loving investors in South Korea, who have plowed into leveraged bets on the US carmaker.】

item.title: 道格-福特在贸易主导的安大略省大选中第三次赢得多数票
item.description: 道格-福特连续第三次赢得安大略省领导人选举，因为加拿大制造业中心地带的选民选择了一个熟悉的面孔来引导受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易政策威胁的经济。【原文：Doug Ford won a third straight election to lead Ontario, as voters in Canada’s manufacturing heartland opted for a familiar face to steer an economy that’s under threat from US President Donald Trump’s trade policy.】

item.title: 印尼盾因特朗普关税担忧跌至五年新低
item.description: 由于对美国关税的担忧削弱了风险情绪，印尼盾暴跌至近五年来的最低水平。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah plunged to its lowest level in almost five years as worries over US tariffs sapped risk sentiment.】

item.title: 中国在能源目标上的退步使气候目标面临风险
item.description: 近二十年来，中国一直通过监测经济增长所消耗的能源来对经济进行分级。这一做法将于今年结束，但与官方目标相差甚远。【原文：For nearly two decades, China has graded the economy by monitoring the amount of energy it consumes to deliver growth. That is set to end this year — far short of official targets.】

item.title: 特朗普向习近平施压，威胁提高关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布对中国进口商品征收额外关税，这增加了中国政府加大报复力度的风险，也加剧了世界两大经济体之间的紧张关系。【原文：President Donald Trump unveiled additional tariffs on Chinese imports, raising the risk of Beijing ramping up its retaliation and a spiraling of tensions between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 加密货币跌势加深，比特币从历史高点下跌 25
item.description: 周五亚洲交易时段，比特币的跌势加剧，从不到六周前创下的历史高点下跌了25%，原因是交易员们扭转了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普当选后的押注。【原文：The rout in Bitcoin worsened during Asian trading hours on Friday, sending it down 25% from the all-time high it set less than six weeks ago as traders reverse bets that followed the election of US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将征收更多关税，中国股市下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将对亚洲国家的进口商品额外征收 10%的税之后，中国股市下跌，这一事态发展加重了投资者对贸易紧张局势加剧的担忧。【原文：Chinese stocks dropped after US President Donald Trump said he would impose an additional 10% tax on the Asian nation’s imports, a development that adds to investors’ worries about intensifying trade tensions.】

item.title: 特朗普最新关税举措令市场警惕中国回应
item.description: 美国最新的关税威胁刺激了投资者对中国可能采取的应对措施进行博弈，新的刺激措施和宽松的货币政策被认为已经摆上桌面。【原文：The latest US tariff threats have spurred investors to game out how China might respond, with moves like fresh stimulus and looser monetary policy seen to be on the table.】

item.title: 英伟达因盈利和前景下滑，亚洲芯片股下跌
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）的财报未能给投资者留下预期的深刻印象，导致该公司股票在美股交易中暴跌，亚洲芯片相关股票随之下挫。【原文：Asia’s chip-related shares sank after Nvidia Corp.’s earnings failed to impress investors expecting blowout results and sent the stock tumbling in US trading.】

item.title: 中国钢铁业因 "供给改革 2.0 "而陷入困境
item.description: 随着国内建筑业放缓和海外保护主义浪潮的兴起，越来越多的人猜测，中国政府将下令关闭工厂，以应对国内建筑业放缓和海外保护主义浪潮。【原文：China’s billion-ton steel industry is edging toward its biggest shake-up in a decade, with speculation growing that Beijing will order plant closures in response to a construction slowdown at home and a wave of protectionism overseas.】

item.title: 日本将打击日本国债支持贷款的繁荣市场
item.description: 日本金融监管机构计划全面打击以政府债券和其他资产为支持的 670 亿美元高收益贷款，这些贷款在官员们对其风险发出警告后仍受到地区银行的青睐。【原文：Japan’s financial regulator plans a sweeping crackdown on $67 billion of high-yield loans backed by government bonds and other assets that have gained popularity among regional banks even after officials warned about their risks.】

item.title: 道富阿波罗私人信贷 ETF 引发美国证券交易委员会关注
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会对华尔街巨头道富公司（State Street Corp. ）和阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission expressed concerns over a much-anticipated private credit exchange-traded fund from Wall Street giants State Street Corp. and Apollo Global Management Inc., asking the firms for more information in a letter Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁提振美元，黄金周线收跌
item.description: 由于对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税议程的担忧与日俱增，导致美元走强，投资者纷纷从创纪录的涨势中获利了结，黄金有望出现今年以来的首次单周下跌。【原文：Gold was on track for its first weekly loss this year as investors booked profits from a record-breaking rally amid increasing concern over President Donald Trump’s tariff agenda, which has strengthened the US dollar.】

item.title: 什么是 "日本化"，中国正在经历 "日本化 "吗？
item.description: 一些经济学家认为，中国有可能陷入日本在 20 世纪 90 年代和 2000 年代所经历的那种长达数十年与通货紧缩和低迷增长作斗争的境地。【原文：Some economists see China in danger of sliding into the same kind of multi-decade struggle against deflation and dismal growth that Japan suffered in the 1990s and 2000s.】

item.title: 新加坡对冲基金大举押注铃木汽车，收益率达 33
item.description: 一家总部位于新加坡的对冲基金去年以 33% 的回报率战胜了市场，该基金表示，铃木汽车公司稳健的印度战略将有助于其投资组合规避全球贸易风险。【原文：A Singapore-based hedge fund that beat the market with a 33% return last year said Suzuki Motor Corp.’s robust India strategy will help shelter its portfolio from global trade risks.】

item.title: 黑暗舰队分水岭中首艘受制裁舰艇被拆毁
item.description: 一艘被美国制裁的老旧油轮正在印度的一个废料场被拆解，这是所谓的 "黑暗舰队 "在瞬息万变的地缘政治格局中的一个潜在分水岭。【原文：An aging oil tanker sanctioned by the US is being taken apart in an Indian scrapyard, a potential watershed moment for the so-called dark fleet in a rapidly changing geopolitical landscape.】

item.title: 京东外卖股价下跌，令投资者不安
item.description: JD.com Inc.的投资者将在下周的财报中看到这家在线零售商的 "内脏检查"，因为该公司正准备在目前由美团主宰的食品配送领域大干一场。【原文：Investors in shares of JD.com Inc. face a gut check in next week’s earnings report from the online retailer as it girds for battle in the food-delivery space currently dominated by Meituan.】

item.title: 印度经济复苏可能因未来贸易风险而蒙上阴影
item.description: 尽管由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要以关税颠覆全球贸易，未来几个月的增长前景仍不明朗，但印度经济在上个季度可能出现反弹。【原文：India’s economy likely rebounded last quarter, although growth prospects remain uncertain in coming months as US President Donald Trump threatens to upend global trade with tariffs.】

item.title: 受补贴影响，东京通胀放缓幅度略超预期
item.description: 由于旨在抵消能源成本的政府补贴扭曲了读数，东京的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，但这一结果不太可能阻止央行考虑进一步上调基准利率。【原文：Inflation in Tokyo slowed more than expected as government subsidies meant to offset energy costs distorted readings, a result that isn’t likely to deter the central bank from considering more hikes to its benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁令全球投资者不安，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对该国的两个主要贸易伙伴征收关税，市场动荡不安，美元走强，石油价格在四天内第三次下跌。【原文：Oil fell for the third time in four days as US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats against two of the country’s major trading partners unsettled markets and boosted the dollar.】

item.title: 星空娱乐股票交易暂停引发可行性担忧
item.description: 星空娱乐集团股份有限公司（Star Entertainment Group Ltd.）股票暂停交易，原因是市场对这家陷入困境的赌场运营商的生存状况产生了猜测。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd. shares were put in a trading pause amid speculation about the struggling casino operator’s status as a viable business.】

item.title: 中国投资者的买盘助推港股走牛
item.description: 内地投资者本月抢购了 1,410 亿港元（合 181 亿美元）的港股，推动了深港通引发的反弹，使 2 月份的资金流入有望达到有记录以来的第二大规模。【原文：Mainland investors snatched up HK$141 billion ($18.1 billion) of Hong Kong stocks this month as they drove a Deepseek-induced rally that has put February inflows on track to reach the second largest on record.】

item.title: 中国黄金支持 ETF 吸引资金流入，金属行业驶入快车道
item.description: 随着黄金价格屡创新高、投资者寻求另类资产，以及地方法规的调整允许更多投资者进入中国这个最大的金银市场，由黄金支持的交易所交易基金在中国不断膨胀。【原文：Gold-backed exchange-traded funds in China — the largest bullion market — are swelling as the metal sets records, investors seek alternative assets, and local rules are tweaked to allow greater access.】

item.title: 英伟达下跌，美元飙升，亚洲股市下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街出现大量卖盘之后，亚洲股市周五开始下跌，因为交易员们正努力应对令人失望的英伟达公司业绩、美国关于关税的进一步细节以及喜忧参半的经济数据。【原文：Asian equities were primed for declines Friday after heavy selling on Wall Street as traders grappled with underwhelming Nvidia Corp results, further details US on tariffs and mixed economic data.】

item.title: 英伟达跌至五个月低点是当日最大期权赌注
item.description: 周四，处于人工智能消费热潮中心的芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.有人打赌，股价可能会进一步下滑。【原文：Worries about the growth outlook for Nvidia Corp., the chipmaker at the center of the AI spending boom, pushed shares to a three-week low on Thursday. And someone just wagered that a deeper slide is in store.】

item.title: 美国从未进口过如此多的食品
item.description: 以全球农业强国著称的美国从未进口过如此多的粮食。【原文：The US, known for being a global agriculture powerhouse, has never imported so much food.】

item.title: 墨西哥在特朗普发出关税威胁后引渡数十名贩毒分子
item.description: 墨西哥引渡了 29 名被控犯有贩毒和其他罪行的人到美国接受指控，以满足唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的避免关税的条件。【原文：Mexico extradited 29 people accused of drug trafficking and other crimes to face charges in the US as it tries to meet President Donald Trump’s conditions to avoid tariffs.】

item.title: 加拿大石油中心地带：贸易战引发预算短缺
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易战前景对经济增长和石油收入的前景构成了压力，加拿大最大的石油生产省份阿尔伯塔省预计在四年盈余之后将首次出现预算赤字。【原文：Alberta, Canada’s top oil-producing province, is projecting its first budget deficit after four years of surpluses as the prospect of a trade war with the US weighs on the outlook for economic growth and oil revenue.】
